revision.text:
{{use dmy dates|date=August 2014}} {{Infobox film | name = I'm Not Harry Jenson | image = | alt = | caption = | director = [[James Napier Robertson]] | producer = [[Tom Hern]]
[[Edward Sampson (producer)|Edward Sampson]] | writer = [[James Napier Robertson]] | based on = | starring = {{unbulleted list|[[Gareth Reeves]] |[[Jinny Lee Story]] |[[Renato Bartolomei]] |[[Tom Hern]] |[[Cameron Rhodes]]| [[Ian Mune]]|[[Marshall Napier]]|[[Ilona Rodgers]]
[[James Napier Robertson]]}} | narrator = | music = [[Peter Hobbs (composer)|Peter Hobbs]] | cinematography = Rhys Duncan | editing = [[James Napier Robertson]] | studio = Six String Pictures | distributor = Rialto (New Zealand) | released = {{Film date|2009|07|17|NZIFF|df=yes}} | runtime = | country = New Zealand | language = English | budget = | gross = }} '''''I'm Not Harry Jenson''''' is a micro-budget theatrical New Zealand film released in 2009. It is the first feature film written and directed by [[James Napier Robertson]]. It was produced by [[Tom Hern]] through the production company Six String Pictures. ==Release and reception== ''I'm Not Harry Jenson'' premiered at the 2009 New Zealand International Film Festival, where it received strong reviews and sold out screenings, and held its international premiere at the 2009 Shanghai International Film Festival.http://www.scoop.co.nz/stories/BU1006/S00343/nz-film-lawyer-honoured-by-shanghai-film-festival.htm The ''National Radio Film Review'' gave it 4 stars, calling it "a remarkable result, doesn't feel like a feature debut but a thriller from the hands of an experienced player...an impressive piece of work"{{cite web|url=http://www.radionz.co.nz/national/programmes/ninetonoon/audio/2202712/film-review-graeme-tuckett |title=Film review - Graeme Tuckett |work=Radio New Zealand}} [[Voxy Movie Review]] gave it "a very solid 7.5 out of 10", putting emphasis on the "great writing, directing and in particular acting."http://www.voxy.co.nz/entertainment/movie-review-im-not-harry-jenson/206/20525 The ''[[New Zealand Herald]]'' gave the film three stars, calling it a "small-scale whodunnit ... but shows how smart writing and good acting can compensate for a tiny budget". The review stated "the young writer/director achieves moments of real tension" with "some wonderful lines", and the reveal was a "scene of some mastery".{{cite news|url=http://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/news/article.cfm?c_id=1501119&objectid=10622798 |title=I'm not Harry Jenson |work=The New Zealand Herald| author=Calder, Peter | date=29 January 2010}} It was released nationwide in theatres throughout New Zealand in 2010, but failed to do much business at the box office. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{official website|http://www.imnotharryjenson.com/}} * {{IMDb title|1413534}} {{DEFAULTSORT:I'm Not Harry Jenson}} [[Category:2009 films]] [[Category:New Zealand thriller films]] [[Category:2000s thriller drama films]] [[Category:New Zealand films]] [[Category:English-language films]]
